entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
